Text:
DONT DOWNLOAD THIS TORRENT !!!!

Watch it !!!!! DEATH virus on Setup.exe file, and also an autorun.inf that runs the setup.exe file.

Autorun.inf says:

[autorun]
open=Setup.exe
icon=Setup.exe
label=Amnesia - The Dark Descent

Virus caught with Avast antivirus on 29/04/2011, the antivirus says HIGH severity.

Stop this torrent being seeded !!!!!!!
